content.rendered:
For each extra kilo Tshs 8000/- will be charged on local flights and USD 5.00 for International flights.

For more details visit : https://www.Air Tanzania.com.lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

 Air Tanzania Hand | Cabin Baggage

 Air Tanzania Checked Baggage
